body_html: According to my experiments, the shorter bug-reproducing code leads to correct [121.88354, 11.040088, -0.22156183] on tensorflow-gpu v1.8.0 and v1.9.0, but prints incorrect [121.88354, 0.09057899, -0.22156183] on tensorflow-gpu v1.10.0.

body: According to my experiments, the shorter bug-reproducing code leads to correct `[121.88354, 11.040088, -0.22156183]` on tensorflow-gpu v1.8.0 and v1.9.0, but prints incorrect `[121.88354, 0.09057899, -0.22156183]` on tensorflow-gpu v1.10.0.
